00023 #ifndef __BKE_TESSMESH_H__
00024 #define __BKE_TESSMESH_H__
00025 
00026 #include "BKE_customdata.h"
00027 #include "bmesh.h"
00028 
00029 struct BMesh;
00030 struct BMLoop;
00031 struct BMFace;
00032 struct Mesh;
00033 struct DerivedMesh;
00034 
00035 /* ok: the EDBM module is for editmode bmesh stuff.  in contrast, the 
00036  *     BMEdit module is for code shared with blenkernel that concerns
00037  *     the BMEditMesh structure.
00038  */
00039 
00040 /* this structure replaces EditMesh.
00041  *
00042  * through this, you get access to both the edit bmesh,
00043  * it's tessellation, and various stuff that doesn't belong in the BMesh
00044  * struct itself.
00045  *
00046  * the entire derivedmesh and modifier system works with this structure,
00047  * and not BMesh.  Mesh->edit_bmesh stores a pointer to this structure. */
00048 typedef struct BMEditMesh {
00049     struct BMesh *bm;
00050 
00051     /*this is for undoing failed operations*/
00052     struct BMEditMesh *emcopy;
00053     int emcopyusers;
00054     
00055     /* we store tessellations as triplets of three loops,
00056      * which each define a triangle.*/
00057     struct BMLoop *(*looptris)[3];
00058     int tottri;
00059 
00060     /*derivedmesh stuff*/
00061     struct DerivedMesh *derivedFinal, *derivedCage;
00062     CustomDataMask lastDataMask;
00063 
00064     /* index tables, to map indices to elements via
00065      * EDBM_index_arrays_init and associated functions.  don't
00066      * touch this or read it directly.*/
00067     struct BMVert **vert_index;
00068     struct BMEdge **edge_index;
00069     struct BMFace **face_index;
00070 
00071     /*selection mode*/
00072     short selectmode;
00073     short mat_nr;
00074 
00075     /*Mesh structure this editmesh came from, if it came from one*/
00076     struct Mesh *me;
00077     struct Object *ob;
00078 
00079     /*temp variables for x-mirror editing*/
00080     int mirror_cdlayer; /* -1 is invalid */
00081     int mirr_free_arrays;
00082 } BMEditMesh;
00083 
00084 void BMEdit_RecalcTessellation(BMEditMesh *tm);
00085 BMEditMesh *BMEdit_Create(BMesh *bm, int do_tessellate);
00086 BMEditMesh *BMEdit_Copy(BMEditMesh *tm);
00087 BMEditMesh *BMEdit_FromObject(struct Object *ob);
00088 void BMEdit_Free(BMEditMesh *em);
00089 void BMEdit_UpdateLinkedCustomData(BMEditMesh *em);
00090 
00091 #endif /* __BKE_TESSMESH_H__ */
